entities.description: The frequency count of responses for each unique identifier or response option without any weighting.
The percentage representation of each unique identifier or response option within the total responses.
The count of missing data entries for the particular variable.
The total number of cases or responses recorded for the variable.
The number assigned to an offender in the survey data.

relationships.description: Indicates the frequency count of responses for each unique identifier or response option within the survey variable.
Indicates the percentage representation of each unique identifier or response option within the total responses for the survey variable.
Represents the count of missing data entries for a particular survey variable.
Indicates the total number of cases or responses recorded for a survey variable.
Indicates the number assigned to an offender as per the survey variable.
